summary: Claude Code: Git Workspace Initialization and Guidance

message.content: claude mcp add github-server -e GITHUB_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN=YOUR_TOKEN -- npx "@modelcontextprotocol/server-github"

content.text: I'll help you add the GitHub MCP server to Claude Code. This command will configure the GitHub Model Context Protocol server with your personal access token.

input.command: claude mcp add github-server -e GITHUB_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN=YOUR_TOKEN -- npx "@modelcontextprotocol/server-github"
input.description: Add GitHub MCP server to Claude Code configuration

content.content:
Added stdio MCP server github-server with command: npx @modelcontextprotocol/server-github to local config
File modified: C:\Users\Administrator\.claude.json [project: C:\Users\Administrator]

toolUseResult.stdout:
Added stdio MCP server github-server with command: npx @modelcontextprotocol/server-github to local config
File modified: C:\Users\Administrator\.claude.json [project: C:\Users\Administrator]

content.text:
The GitHub MCP server has been successfully added to your Claude Code configuration. 

**Important**: You'll need to replace `YOUR_TOKEN` with your actual GitHub Personal Access Token. You can do this by:

1. Getting a GitHub Personal Access Token from https://github.com/settings/tokens
2. Editing the `.claude.json` file to replace `YOUR_TOKEN` with your actual token
3. Restarting Claude Code for the changes to take effect

The server will provide GitHub integration capabilities like repository access, issue management, and pull request operations through MCP tools.

message.content: claude mcp add brave-search -s user -e BRAVE_API_KEY=YOUR_API_KEY -- npx -y @modelcontextprotocol/server-brave-search

input.command: claude mcp add brave-search -s user -e BRAVE_API_KEY=YOUR_API_KEY -- npx -y @modelcontextprotocol/server-brave-search
input.description: Add Brave Search MCP server to Claude Code user configuration

content.content:
Added stdio MCP server brave-search with command: npx -y @modelcontextprotocol/server-brave-search to user config
File modified: C:\Users\Administrator\.claude.json

toolUseResult.stdout:
Added stdio MCP server brave-search with command: npx -y @modelcontextprotocol/server-brave-search to user config
File modified: C:\Users\Administrator\.claude.json

content.text:
The Brave Search MCP server has been successfully added to your Claude Code user configuration. 

**Important**: You'll need to replace `YOUR_API_KEY` with your actual Brave Search API key. You can:

1. Get a Brave Search API key from https://api.search.brave.com/app/keys
2. Edit the `.claude.json` file to replace `YOUR_API_KEY` with your actual API key
3. Restart Claude Code for the changes to take effect

The server will provide web search capabilities through MCP tools once configured with a valid API key.
